TopicTitle: O, the things you do for SCIENCE

Articles.Content:
Now that KSP 0.22 is out, we can now utilize one of the greatest things that ever happened to the Kerbal Space Program (apart from EVA, Rover wheels, Planets, and actually functioning SAS): SCIENCE!

However, getting it is not always easy...

So POST YOUR STORIES of the challenges you've faced and overcome for the sake of the sweet, succulent, significant superbness that is SCIENCE.

CHEERS!

Edited December 1, 2013 by quasarrgames
picture of an insane aerobrake i did on eve to get SCIENCE
To share a pic, upload your screenshot to a free service like Imgur.com, then use the BBCode link they provide in your post.
Thanks. I tried to upload to the album on my account so i could stick it here, but there was some weird error when uploading .png screenshots.
